post.body: sounds like my grandma :)
I'm jealous to hear of your spin class. I need to go so bad!
signing off... G'night y'all.
is listening to two pit bull terriers snore on the couch while working the night away...
6 projects due by EOD Friday... I'll be working late tonight.
Dinner, an adult beverage, and my first episode of Entourage. Then more work.
In south bound traffic on 65 after meetings in Brentwood.
thx @cdharrison & @tydna for helping w/ the blogage. Everything is under control. NOW you can see my portfolio: http://tinyurl.com/3etf3v
anyone know how to hide subpages from displaying in the menu bar in Wordpress?? I can't figure it out and it's kind of a big deal. Thx!
just added Book Covers & Posters to the Portfolio page of TobySturgill.com. Check 'em out here: http://tinyurl.com/6ndq7k
in my line of work it seems to be either feast or famine. The famine has ended for now.
Welcome back @realchriselrod!
Miss Piggy is being interviewed on The Today show. Funny.
Post Kairos dinner at Cracker Barrel. I've been craving this all night.
Just got caught jammin to "circus" by a car full Mexican dudes. Awkward.
just got my copy of "Beauty is Calling". Very fulfilling see it printed.
After not having much luck with setting up my online portfolio, I'm going to spin class to work out this frustration... uuugghhhh!
Brand new book I designed for @recreate, "Beauty is Calling", is now avally to buy here: http://tinyurl.com/5hjaue Get your copy TODAY!!
doing much needed food shopping on my lunch break at Publix. I love this store.
a little SEO never hurt anyone. Adding keywords to the pages of tobysturgill.com.
No, MacBook Pro, your startup disk is NOT full. Get your act together and let's get crankin'.
is realizing the full benefit of using Adobe Bridge CS3. Never had much use for it till now. Wow!
Heading to bed after another great day with family. Seeing Dad's side tomorrow.
http://twitpic.com/xh3b - Christmas in progress.
Dinner was amazing if I do say so myself. Now onto opening presents! 'bout time :-D
Cooking dinner for the fam tonight: steak w/ bearnaise, peppered pomme frits & brussle sprouts.
http://twitpic.com/xec7 - Tonight's the night! Finally.
Talking Twitter & blogs w/ dad. Doesn't look good as the AF base is so secure w/ firewalls & security. Hmmm.
http://twitpic.com/xc98 - @rondasturgill demonstrating the Body Blade. You gotta permit for those guns, mom?
The dogs (pitbulls, 50 lbs ea) will be meeting their aunt (malteese/yorkie, 7 lbs) today. They'll meet on a walk.
http://twitpic.com/xb1t - Breakfast on the patio. Nice view.
Alright, alright. I'm up, I'm up. Dad gets in today! But right now... Coffee.
Dad arrives tomorrow which means we can FINALLY open presents! We still haven't had Christmas, y'all.
Ugh! My shirt is tight in all the wrong places. I have 15 days to get in ship-shape. Yikes!!
Wrapping up lunch with @rondasturgill at Quiznos. More shopping lies ahead.
http://twitpic.com/x0n9 - You'd think w/ all the money Walmart has they could afford better signage & cuter girl.
http://twitpic.com/wzp0 - @rondasturgill pretending to be Paula Dean making her spirited mincemeat pie.
my grandpa's roller-ball mouse (circa 1997) won't allow me to highlight text! I'm not able to copy & paste! Ugh.
Warm, damp and foggy morning here in Pinehurst, NC. Enjoying some homemade Dunkin Donuts coffee.
TV by the fire for the rest of the night.
